screens.name: Read_Only_Screen_for_Statement_of_Need
screens.label: Read Only Screen for Statement of Need

value.stringValue: Provide a brief history of the program and significant changes.
Provide the URL Link for the previous year's Program Guideline
Provide the current standing of all awards contracted under the programs current state

Description_of_Suggestion__c:Briefly describe the suggested guideline change or the area needing clarification, Purpose_and_Improvement__c:Explain how the program and its key features can be improved or why clarification is needed in its guidelines
Step 2: Detailing the Change For each suggested change, complete the following sections:

Impacted_Process__c:Describe which processes within the program are affected and how they will change, Impacted_Departments_Programs__c:Identify any departments or programs that might be affected by the change and describe the nature of the impact
Step 3: Impact Analysis For each suggested change, assess its impact:
